long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects connections to https://local.connectme.us:43003 (which is supposed to point at 127.0.0.1 *anyway* but sometimes your network administrator may fail to set this in your DNS/hosts) to http://127.0.0.1:33003, where the modern Aspera Connect client bridge application actually listens.
